duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance on molding machines and Fanuc robots, including predictive, preventative, and reactive maintenance
Adhere to state and federal OSHA codes and regulations, as well as health, safety, and environmental rules and regulations
Complete preventive and corrective work orders, maintain equipment and facilities, and perform spare parts inventory activity
Utilize written and verbal communication skills to maintain proper communication and data entry into the tracking system
Maintain a clean and organized maintenance area and contribute to TPM, Kaizen, and CIP activities
Accept personal ownership of company, plant, and department goals for quality, productivity, and safety

education_certification.credential: Technical degree in a related field of study preferred (Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Robotics, or related field)
